content.title: End of the Campaign
content.creator:
Elysian Studio
March 9, 2025
content.content: Hi, folks! All the files are ready. All that‚Äôs left is to upload them to Google Drive and send them to you. I‚Äôll do that as soon as Kickstarter sends me the funds. It takes about 10 to 20 days. Just a little more waiting to go. In the meantime, feel free to print our free model. content.title: Thank you all for your support me!
content.creator:
Elysian Studio
March 8, 2025
content.content: Our campaign is drawing to a close. All the most exciting stretch goals have been unlocked! A heartfelt thank you to each and every one of you for your incredible support!

content.title: Check out these Divas!
content.creator:
Elysian Studio
February 25, 2025
content.content:
Our friend from Miniatures Cave has created a fantastic new campaign featuring the "Divas of Hind"! This unique collection of 3D printable models brings to life characters inspired from eastern mythology. 


You can check the campaign here - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/miniatures-cave/divas-of-hind-vol-1?ref=4ri675

content.title: Check out this awesome project from our friends! üöÄ
content.creator:
Elysian Studio
February 23, 2025
content.content:
Mad Hawk Miniatures is currently running an exciting Kickstarter campaign for Saya Silent Arrow.
The models are offered in 75mm, 120mm, and 180mm scales, pre-supported and ready to print.
If you‚Äôre looking for an interesting project to print and paint, be sure to check them out!

Link:https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/madhawkminiatures/saya-silent-arrow-3d-printable-miniatures

content.title: New video
content.creator:
Elysian Studio
February 22, 2025
content.content: Hey everyone! Check out our latest video! We've put a lot of effort into showcasing our miniatures from every angle. Plus, you'll get a behind-the-scenes look at our studio and the test printing process. Let us know what you think!

content.title: New free model for you!
content.creator:
Elysian Studio
February 19, 2025
content.content:
Meet Eir, the Forge Maiden ‚Äì a true master of her craft! üî•‚öíÔ∏è
You can download her for free on our Discord server and bring her to life with your 3D printer. No strings attached!
I‚Äôd love to hear your feedback on the print in the comments‚Äîlet me know how she turns out!

comments.text: Friends, the Discord link had a catch ‚Äì my mistake. Here's the permanent link: https://discord.gg/Q4venJVDM8
Discord says "Invite invalid" for that link.

content.title: First stretch goal
content.creator:
Elysian Studio
February 18, 2025
content.content: Hey everyone! Less than 24 hours in, and we've already unlocked our first stretch goal! Huge thanks for your amazing support! :)
